feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.1

Features

  • Enhancement: include owner username in post-consumption variables @Freddy-0 (#7270)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: support multiple inbox tags from stats widget @shamoon (#7281)
  • Fix: Removes Turkish from the NLTK languages @stumpylog (#7246)
  • Fix: include trashed docs in existing doc check @shamoon (#7229)

Dependencies

  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot (#7261)
  • Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 2 updates @dependabot (#7266)

All App Changes

7 changes - Fix: support multiple inbox tags from stats widget @shamoon ([#7281](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7281)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7261](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7261)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7266](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7266)) - Enhancement: include owner username in post-consumption variables @Freddy-0 ([#7270](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7270)) - Chore: Squash older automatic migrations @stumpylog ([#7267](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7267)) - Fix: Removes Turkish from the NLTK languages @stumpylog ([#7246](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7246)) - Fix: include trashed docs in existing doc check @shamoon ([#7229](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7229))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.2

Changes

  • Change: more clearly handle init permissions error @shamoon (#7334)
  • Chore: add permissions info link from webUI @shamoon (#7310)
  • Fix: increase search input text contrast with light custom theme colors @JayBkr (#7303)

Dependencies

  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot (#7296)
  • Chore(deps): Bump tika-client from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 in the small-changes group @dependabot (#7297)

All App Changes

5 changes - Change: more clearly handle init permissions error @shamoon ([#7334](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7334)) - Chore: add permissions info link from webUI @shamoon ([#7310](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7310)) - Fix: increase search input text contrast with light custom theme colors @JayBkr ([#7303](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7303)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7296](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7296)) - Chore(deps): Bump tika-client from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#7297](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7297))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.3
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.3

Features

  • Enhancement: optimize tasks / stats reload @shamoon (#7402)
  • Enhancement: allow specifying default currency for Monetary custom field @shamoon (#7381)
  • Enhancement: specify when pre-check fails for documents in trash @shamoon (#7355)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: clear selection after reload for management lists @shamoon (#7421)
  • Fix: disable inline create buttons if insufficient permissions @shamoon (#7401)
  • Fix: use entire document for dropzone @shamoon (#7342)

Maintenance

  • Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.7.0 to 0.8.0 in the actions group @dependabot (#7371)

Dependencies

11 changes - Chore(deps): Bump django from 4.2.14 to 4.2.15 @dependabot ([#7412](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7412)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7394](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7394)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 5 updates @dependabot ([#7397](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7397)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.42.1 to 1.45.3 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7367](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7367)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 20.12.2 to 22.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7366](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7366)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7365](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7365)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 9.0.1 to 10.0.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7370](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7370)) - Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.7.0 to 0.8.0 in the actions group @dependabot ([#7371](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7371)) - Chore(deps): Bump zone.js from 0.14.4 to 0.14.8 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7368](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7368)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump jest-preset-angular from 14.1.1 to 14.2.2 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#7364](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7364)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 20 updates @dependabot ([#7363](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7363))

All App Changes

15 changes - Fix: clear selection after reload for management lists @shamoon ([#7421](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7421)) - Enhancement: optimize tasks / stats reload @shamoon ([#7402](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7402)) - Enhancement: allow specifying default currency for Monetary custom field @shamoon ([#7381](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7381)) - Enhancement: specify when pre-check fails for documents in trash @shamoon ([#7355](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7355)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7394](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7394)) - Fix: disable inline create buttons if insufficient permissions @shamoon ([#7401](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7401)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 5 updates @dependabot ([#7397](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7397)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.42.1 to 1.45.3 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7367](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7367)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 20.12.2 to 22.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7366](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7366)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7365](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7365)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 9.0.1 to 10.0.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7370](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7370)) - Chore(deps): Bump zone.js from 0.14.4 to 0.14.8 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7368](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7368)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump jest-preset-angular from 14.1.1 to 14.2.2 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#7364](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7364)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 20 updates @dependabot ([#7363](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7363)) - Fix: use entire document for dropzone @shamoon ([#7342](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7342))

paperless-ngx 2.11.4

Bug Fixes

All App Changes

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.6
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.6

[!NOTE]
Paperless-ngx v2.11.6 fixes an issue with one of our dependencies that prevented uploading files in version 2.11.5. "Bare-metal" users may need to re-download the NLTK data to /usr/share/nltk_data (see the docs).

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix nltk tokenizer breaking change @shamoon (#7522)
  • Fix: use JSON for update archive file auditlog entries @shamoon (#7503)
  • Fix: respect deskew / rotate pages from AppConfig if set @shamoon (#7501)

Dependencies

5 changes - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 6 updates @dependabot ([#7502](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7502)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7497](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7497)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7472](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7472)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ruff from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 in the development group @dependabot ([#7457](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7457)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7460](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7460))

All App Changes

8 changes - Fix: fix nltk tokenizer breaking change @shamoon ([#7522](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7522)) - Fix: use JSON for update archive file auditlog entries @shamoon ([#7503](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7503)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 6 updates @dependabot ([#7502](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7502)) - Fix: respect deskew / rotate pages from AppConfig if set @shamoon ([#7501](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7501)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7497](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7497)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7472](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7472)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ruff from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 in the development group @dependabot ([#7457](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7457)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7460](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7460))
